### PLEASE READ THIS!
###
### TO EVERYBODY: This is the master index files for db packages produced at
### the Gentleman-Lab. It is for Gentleman-Lab's internal use only.
###
### TO GENTLEMAN LAB MEMBERS: This file contains absolute paths that point to
### our NFS-mounted shared partition. This means that you must use
### makeAnnDbPkg("pkg") on a server where user homes are NFS-mounted for
### this to work (e.g. on any gopher).


### =========================================================================
### HUMANCHIP_DB schema
### -------------------
###   Fields:
###     Package (*)
###     Title
###     Version (*)
###     PkgTemplate: HUMANCHIP.DB
###     DBfile (*)
###     DBschema
###     AnnObjPrefix (*)
###     AnnObjTarget
###     organism
###     species
###     manufacturer
###     chipName
###     manufacturerUrl
###     biocViews
### Fields marked with an (*) are required.

### - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
### HUMANCHIP_DB > Affymetrix chips
###
### Old path for Nianhua's sqlite files:
###   /home/nli/proj/ann/nli/annosrc.orig/affychip/2007-Mar5/human/

Package: hcg110.db
Version: 2.0.1
PkgTemplate: HUMANCHIP.DB
DBfile: /home/mcarlson/sanctionedSqlite/hcg110.sqlite
AnnObjPrefix: hcg110
species: Human
manufacturer: Affymetrix

### =========================================================================
### RODENTCHIP_DB schema
### --------------------
###   Fields:
###     Package (*)
###     Title
###     Version (*)
###     PkgTemplate: RODENTCHIP.DB
###     DBfile (*)
###     DBschema
###     AnnObjPrefix (*)
###     AnnObjTarget
###     organism
###     species
###     manufacturer
###     chipName
###     manufacturerUrl
###     biocViews
### Fields marked with an (*) are required.

### - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

### =========================================================================
### FLYCHIP_DB schema
### -----------------
###   Fields:
###     Package (*)
###     Title
###     Version (*)
###     PkgTemplate: FLYCHIP.DB
###     DBfile (*)
###     DBschema
###     AnnObjPrefix (*)
###     AnnObjTarget
###     organism
###     species
###     manufacturer
###     chipName
###     manufacturerUrl
###     biocViews
### Fields marked with an (*) are required.

Package: drosgenome1.db
Version: 2.0.1
PkgTemplate: FLYCHIP.DB
DBfile: /home/mcarlson/sanctionedSqlite/drosgenome1.sqlite
AnnObjPrefix: drosgenome1
species: Fly
manufacturer: Affymetrix

PkgTemplate: FLYCHIP.DB
DBfile: /home/mcarlson/sanctionedSqlite/drosophila2.sqlite
AnnObjPrefix: drosophila2
species: Fly
manufacturer: Affymetrix

PkgTemplate: FLYCHIP.DB
DBfile: /home/mcarlson/sanctionedSqlite/indac.sqlite
AnnObjPrefix: indac
species: Fly
manufacturer: INDAC


### =========================================================================
### YEASTCHIP_DB schema
### -------------------
###   Fields:
###     Package (*)
###     Title
###     Version (*)
###     PkgTemplate: YEASTCHIP.DB
###     DBfile (*)
###     DBschema
###     AnnObjPrefix (*)
###     AnnObjTarget
###     organism
###     species
###     manufacturer
###     chipName
###     manufacturerUrl
###     biocViews
### Fields marked with an (*) are required.

### - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
### YEASTCHIP_DB > Affymetrix chips
###
### Old path for Nianhua's sqlite files:
###   /home/nli/proj/ann/nli/annosrc.orig/affychip/2007-Mar5/yeast/

Package: yeast2.db
Version: 2.0.1
PkgTemplate: YEASTCHIP.DB
DBfile: /home/mcarlson/sanctionedSqlite/yeast2.sqlite
AnnObjPrefix: yeast2
species: Yeast
manufacturer: Affymetrix

Package: ygs98.db
Version: 2.0.1
PkgTemplate: YEASTCHIP.DB
DBfile: /home/mcarlson/sanctionedSqlite/ygs98.sqlite
AnnObjPrefix: ygs98
species: Yeast
manufacturer: Affymetrix


### =========================================================================
### ARABIDOPSISCHIP_DB schema
### -------------------------
###   Fields:
###     Package (*)
###     Title
###     Version (*)
###     PkgTemplate: ARABIDOPSISCHIP.DB
###     DBfile (*)
###     DBschema
###     AnnObjPrefix (*)
###     AnnObjTarget
###     organism
###     species
###     manufacturer
###     chipName
###     manufacturerUrl
###     biocViews
### Fields marked with an (*) are required.

### - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
### ARABIDOPSISCHIP_DB > Affymetrix chips
###

### =========================================================================
### HUMAN_DB/RODENT_DB/FLY_DB/YEAST_DB schemas
### ------------------------------------------
###   Fields:
###     Package (*)
###     Title
###     Version (*)
###     PkgTemplate: HUMAN.DB|RODENT.DB|FLY.DB|YEAST.DB
###     DBfile (*)
###     DBschema
###     AnnObjPrefix (*)
###     AnnObjTarget (*)
###     organism
###     species
###     biocViews (*)
### Fields marked with an (*) are required.

Package: org.Hs.eg.db
Version: 2.0.1
PkgTemplate: HUMAN.DB
DBfile: /home/mcarlson/sanctionedSqlite/org.Hs.eg.sqlite
AnnObjPrefix: org.Hs.eg
AnnObjTarget: Human
species: Human
biocViews: AnnotationData, Homo_sapiens, humanLLMappings

### - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
### Affymetrix chips

Package: huex10stv2.db
Version: 1.17.0
PkgTemplate: AFFYHUEX.DB
DBfile:
DBschema: AFFYHUEX_DB
AnnObjPrefix: huex10stv2
AnnObjTarget: exon array HuEx-1_0-st-v2
organism: Homo sapiens
species: Human
manufacturer: Affymetrix
chipName: HuEx-1_0-st-v2
manufacturerUrl: NA
biocViews: AnnotationData, AffymetrixChip, Homo_sapiens, huex10stv2
